ya10.1.2:2.1_0: Dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu cakkhu, na cakkhundriyaṁ. Cakkhundriyaṁ cakkhu ceva cakkhundriyañca.
ya10.1.2:5.1_0: Dibbasotaṁ taṇhāsotaṁ sotaṁ, na sotindriyaṁ. Sotindriyaṁ sotañceva sotindriyañca.
ya10.1.2:12.1_0: Kāyindriyaṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso kāyo, na kāyindriyaṁ. Kāyindriyaṁ kāyo ceva kāyindriyañca.

ya10.1.2:54.1_1: Sotañca sotindriyañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva sotaṁ na ca sotindriyaṁ.

ya10.1.2:394.1_0: Yaṁ sotaṁ indriyaṁ taṁ sotañceva indriyañca. Avasesaṁ sotaṁ na indriyaṁ.
ya10.1.2:396.1_0: Sotindriyaṁ indriyañceva sotindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na sotindriyaṁ.
ya10.1.2:399.1_0: Ghānindriyaṁ indriyañceva ghānindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na ghānindriyaṁ.
ya10.1.2:402.1_0: Jivhindriyaṁ indriyañceva jivhindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na jivhindriyaṁ.
ya10.1.2:404.1_0: Yo kāyo indriyaṁ so kāyo ceva indriyañca. Avaseso kāyo na indriyā.
ya10.1.2:406.1_0: Kāyindriyaṁ indriyañceva kāyindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na kāyindriyaṁ.
ya10.1.2:409.1_0: Manindriyaṁ indriyañceva manindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na manindriyaṁ.
ya10.1.2:412.1_0: Itthindriyaṁ indriyañceva itthindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na itthindriyaṁ.
ya10.1.2:415.1_0: Purisindriyaṁ indriyañceva purisindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na purisindriyaṁ.
ya10.1.2:418.1_0: Jīvitindriyaṁ indriyañceva jīvitindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na jīvitindriyaṁ.

ya10.1.2:427.1_0: Somanassindriyaṁ indriyañceva somanassindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na somanassindriyaṁ.
ya10.1.2:430.1_0: Domanassindriyaṁ indriyañceva domanassindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na domanassindriyaṁ.
ya10.1.2:432.1_0: Yā upekkhā indriyaṁ sā upekkhā ceva indriyañca. Avasesā upekkhā na indriyaṁ.
ya10.1.2:434.1_0: Upekkhindriyaṁ indriyañceva upekkhindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na upekkhindriyaṁ.
ya10.1.2:437.1_0: Saddhindriyaṁ indriyañceva saddhindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na saddhindriyaṁ.
ya10.1.2:440.1_0: Vīriyindriyaṁ indriyañceva vīriyindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na vīriyindriyaṁ.
ya10.1.2:443.1_0: Satindriyaṁ indriyañceva satindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na satindriyaṁ.
ya10.1.2:446.1_0: Samādhindriyaṁ indriyañceva samādhindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na samādhindriyaṁ.
ya10.1.2:449.1_0: Paññindriyaṁ indriyañceva paññindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na paññindriyaṁ.
ya10.1.2:455.1_0: Aññindriyaṁ indriyañceva aññindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na aññindriyaṁ.
ya10.1.2:458.1_0: Aññātāvindriyaṁ indriyañceva aññātāvindriyañca. Avasesā indriyā na aññātāvindriyaṁ.
ya10.1.2:460.1_0: Cakkhuṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na cakkhu, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:460.1_1: Cakkhuñca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva cakkhu na ca indriyā.
ya10.1.2:463.1_0: Sotaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na sotaṁ, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:463.1_1: Sotañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva sotaṁ na ca indriyā.
ya10.1.2:466.1_0: Ghānaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na ghānaṁ, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:466.1_1: Ghānañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva ghānaṁ na ca indriyā.
ya10.1.2:469.1_0: Jivhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na jivhā, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:469.1_1: Jivhañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva jivhā na ca indriyā.
ya10.1.2:474.1_0: Manaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na mano, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:474.1_1: Manañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva mano na ca indriyā.
ya10.1.2:477.1_0: Itthiṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na itthī, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:477.1_1: Itthiñca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva itthī na ca indriyā.
ya10.1.2:480.1_0: Purisaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na puriso, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:480.1_1: Purisañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva puriso na ca indriyā.
ya10.1.2:483.1_0: Jīvitaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na jīvitaṁ, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:483.1_1: Jīvitañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva jīvitaṁ na ca indriyā.
ya10.1.2:486.1_0: Sukhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na sukhaṁ, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:486.1_1: Sukhañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva sukhaṁ na ca indriyā.
ya10.1.2:489.1_0: Dukkhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na dukkhaṁ, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:489.1_1: Dukkhañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva dukkhaṁ na ca indriyā.
ya10.1.2:492.1_0: Somanassaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na somanassaṁ, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:492.1_1: Somanassañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva somanassaṁ na ca indriyā.
ya10.1.2:495.1_0: Domanassaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na domanassaṁ, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:495.1_1: Domanassañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva domanassaṁ na ca indriyā.
ya10.1.2:498.1_0: Upekkhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na upekkhā, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:498.1_1: Upekkhañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva upekkhā na ca indriyā.
ya10.1.2:501.1_0: Saddhaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na saddhā, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:501.1_1: Saddhañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva saddhā na ca indriyā.
ya10.1.2:504.1_0: Vīriyaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na vīriyaṁ, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:504.1_1: Vīriyañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva vīriyaṁ na ca indriyā.
ya10.1.2:507.1_0: Satiṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na sati, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:507.1_1: Satiñca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva sati na ca indriyā.
ya10.1.2:510.1_0: Samādhiṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na samādhi, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:510.1_1: Samādhiñca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva samādhi na ca indriyā.
ya10.1.2:513.1_0: Paññaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na paññā, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:513.1_1: Paññañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva paññā na ca indriyā.
ya10.1.2:516.1_0: Anaññātaññassāmītiṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na anaññātaññassāmīti, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:516.1_1: Anaññātaññassāmītiñca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva anaññātaññassāmīti na ca indriyā.
ya10.1.2:519.1_0: Aññaṁ ṭhapetvā avasesā indriyā na aññaṁ, indriyā.
ya10.1.2:519.1_1: Aññañca indriye ca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva aññaṁ na ca indriyā.
